trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets the events in an event log, or a list of the event logs, on the local or remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機電腦或遠端電腦上事件記錄檔中的事件，或事件記錄檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: LogName (Default)
trans-unit.target: LogName （預設值）

trans-unit.source: List
trans-unit.target: 清單

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-EventLog** cmdlet gets events and event logs on the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: **Get-eventlog** cmdlet 取得事件，並在本機和遠端電腦上的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of this cmdlet to search for events by using their property values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此 cmdlet 的參數來使用它們的屬性值中搜尋事件。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet gets only the events that match all of the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會取得符合所有指定的屬性值的事件。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the EventLog noun work only on classic event logs.
trans-unit.target: 包含 EventLog 名詞的 cmdlet 只能用於傳統事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: To get events from logs that use the Windows Event Log technology in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, use Get-WinEvent.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 中，若要從使用「Windows 事件記錄檔」技術的記錄檔中取得事件，請使用 Get-WinEvent。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get event logs on a computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得電腦上的事件記錄檔

trans-unit.source: This command gets the event logs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得電腦上的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get the five most recent entries from a specific event log
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 從特定的事件記錄檔取得五個最新的項目

trans-unit.source: This command gets the five most recent entries from the Application event log.
trans-unit.target: 此命令從應用程式事件記錄檔中取得 5 個最新的項目。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Find all sources that are represented in a specific number of entries in an event log
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 尋找在特定數目的事件記錄檔中的項目所代表的所有來源

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to find all of the sources that are represented in the 1000 most recent entries in the System event log.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何尋找 System 事件記錄檔中 1000 個最新項目所代表的所有來源。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets the 1,000 most recent entries from the System event log and stores them in the $Events variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令會從系統事件記錄檔取得 1000 個最新的項目，並將它們儲存在 $Events 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the events in $Events to the Group-Object cmdlet, which groups the entries by the value of the Source property.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將 $Events 中的事件傳送至 Group-object cmdlet，其來源屬性的值來分組這些項目。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a second pipeline operator to send the grouped events to the Sort-Object cmdlet, which sorts them in descending order, so the most frequently appearing source is listed first.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用第二個管線運算子將已分組的事件傳送至 Sort-Object Cmdlet，這會依遞減順序排序這些事件，讓出現頻率最高的來源最先列出。

trans-unit.source: Source is just one property of event log entries.
trans-unit.target: Source 只是事件記錄項目的一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties of an event log entry, pipe the event log entries to the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看事件記錄項目的所有屬性，請使用管線將事件記錄項目傳送至 Get-Member Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get error events from a specific event log
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 取得特定的事件記錄檔錯誤事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets only error events from the System event log.
trans-unit.target: 此命令從 System 事件記錄檔中只取得錯誤事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Get events from a specific event log with an Instance ID and Source value
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 從執行個體識別碼和來源值的特定事件記錄檔取得事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets events from the System log that have an InstanceID of 3221235481 and a Source value of DCOM.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從具有 InstanceID 為 3221235481 且 Source 值 DCOM 的系統記錄檔取得事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Get event log events from multiple computers
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 從多部電腦取得事件記錄檔事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets the events from the Windows PowerShell event log on three computers, Server01, Server02, and the local computer, known as localhost.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得 Windows PowerShell 事件記錄檔的三部電腦、 Server01、 Server02 和本機電腦，稱為 [本機主機上的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Get all events in an event log that have include a specific word in the message value
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 取得事件記錄檔中有訊息值中包含特定單字的所有事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets all the events in the Windows PowerShell event log that have a message value that includes the word failed.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得所有事件在 Windows PowerShell 事件記錄檔中包含字 [失敗的訊息值。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Display the property values of an event in a list
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 在清單中顯示事件的屬性值

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to display the property values of an event in a list.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何以清單顯示事件的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets the newest event from the System event log and saves it in the $A variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令會從系統事件記錄檔取得最新的事件，並將它儲存在 $A 變數中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the event in $a to the Format-List command, which displays all (*) of the event properties.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將 $a 中的事件傳送至 Format-List 命令，這會顯示事件的全部 (*) 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Get events from an event log with using a source and event ID
trans-unit.target: 範例 9︰ 取得事件記錄檔使用的來源和事件識別碼的事件

trans-unit.source: This command gets events in the Application event log where the source is Outlook and the event ID is 34.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得 Application 事件記錄檔中來源為 Outlook 且事件識別碼為 34 的事件。

trans-unit.source: Even though this cmdlet does not have an *EventID* parameter, you can use the Where-Object cmdlet to select events based on the value of any event property.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個指令程式並沒有 *EventID* 參數，您可以使用 Where-object 指令程式來選取任何事件屬性的值為基礎的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Get event in an event log that is grouped by a property
trans-unit.target: 範例 10︰ 取得屬性會依事件記錄檔中的事件

trans-unit.source: This command returns the events in the system log grouped by the value of their UserName property.
trans-unit.target: 此命令傳回的事件之 UserName 屬性的值加以分組的系統記錄中。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *UserName* parameter to get only events in which the user name begins with NT*.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *UserName* 參數，以取得在其中的使用者名稱開頭 NT * 的事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 11: Get all errors in an event log that occurred during a specific time frame
trans-unit.target: 範例 11︰ 取得特定的時間範圍期間所發生的事件記錄檔中的所有錯誤

trans-unit.source: This command gets all of the errors in the Windows PowerShell event log that occurred in June 2008.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得 Windows PowerShell 事件記錄檔中在 2008 年 6 月發生的所有錯誤。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -After
trans-unit.target: 之後

trans-unit.source: Specifies the data and time that this cmdlet get events that occur after.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料和此指令程式取得事件發生之後的時間。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as the one returned by the Get-Date cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date cmdlet 所傳回。

trans-unit.source: -AsBaseObject
trans-unit.target: -AsBaseObject

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet returns a standard **System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry** object for each event.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會傳回標準 **System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry** 每個事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, this cmdlet returns an extended **PSObject** object with additional **EventLogName**, **Source**, and **InstanceId** properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個參數，此 cmdlet 會傳回延伸 **PSObject** 物件與其他 **EventLogName**, ，**來源**, ，和 **InstanceId** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see the effect of this parameter, pipe the events to the Get-Member cmdlet and examine the TypeName value in the result.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看這個參數的效果，請使用管線將事件傳送給 Get-Member Cmdlet，然後檢查結果中的 TypeName 值。

trans-unit.source: -AsString
trans-unit.target: -AsString

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet returns the output as strings, instead of objects.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會傳回為字串，而不是物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: -Before
trans-unit.target: 之前

trans-unit.source: Specifies the data and time that this cmdlet get events that occur before.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料和此指令程式取得事件之前發生的時間。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as the one returned by the **Get-Date** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如所傳回 **Get-date** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設是本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an Internet Protocol (IP) address, or a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 NetBIOS 名稱、 網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址或遠端電腦的完整的網域名稱 (FQDN)。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本機電腦，請輸入電腦名稱、 句點 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此參數不必依賴 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of **Get-EventLog** even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 參數 **Get-eventlog** 即使您的電腦未設定為執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: -EntryType
trans-unit.target: -EntryType

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, the entry type of the events that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 以字串陣列，指定此 cmdlet 會取得事件的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此參數接受的值包括：

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: 錯誤

trans-unit.source: Information
trans-unit.target: 資訊

trans-unit.source: FailureAudit
trans-unit.target: FailureAudit

trans-unit.source: SuccessAudit
trans-unit.target: SuccessAudit

trans-unit.source: Warning.
trans-unit.target: 警告。

trans-unit.source: The default is all events.
trans-unit.target: 預設為所有事件。

trans-unit.source: -Index
trans-unit.target: -索引

trans-unit.source: Specifies the index values that this cmdlet gets events from.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會取得事件的索引值。

trans-unit.source: -InstanceId
trans-unit.target: -執行個體識別碼

trans-unit.source: Specifies the instance IDs that this cmdlet gets events from.
trans-unit.target: 指定執行個體，此 cmdlet 會取得事件的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: -List
trans-unit.target: 清單

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets a list of event logs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得電腦上的事件記錄檔清單。

trans-unit.source: -LogName
trans-unit.target: -LogName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event log.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Enter the log name (the value of the Log property; not the LogDisplayName) of one event log.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入一個事件記錄檔的記錄檔名稱 (Log 屬性的值；而不是 LogDisplayName 的值)。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: -Message
trans-unit.target: 訊息

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string in the event message that this cmdlet gets event information from.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會取得從事件資訊的事件訊息中指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to search for messages that contain certain words or phrases.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來搜尋包含特定單字或片語的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Newest
trans-unit.target: -最新

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of events that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 會取得事件的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet gets the specified number of events, beginning with the newest event in the log.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會取得指定的開頭為最新的事件記錄檔中的事件數。

trans-unit.source: -Source
trans-unit.target: -Source

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, sources that were written to the log that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 以字串陣列，指定寫入的記錄檔，此 cmdlet 會取得的來源。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -UserName
trans-unit.target: -UserName

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, user names that are associated with events.
trans-unit.target: 以字串陣列，指定與事件相關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Enter names or name patterns, such as User01, User*, or Domain01\User*.
trans-unit.target: 輸入名稱或名稱模式，例如 User01，使用者*, ，或 Domain01\User*。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.
trans-unit.target: System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry。

trans-unit.source: System.Diagnostics.EventLog.
trans-unit.target: System.Diagnostics.EventLog。

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: If the *LogName* parameter is specified, the output is a collection of **System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry** objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果 *LogName* 參數，則輸出為一系列 **System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If only the *List* parameter is specified, the output is a collection of **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有 *清單* 參數，則輸出為一系列 **System.Diagnostics.EventLog** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If both the *List* and *AsString* parameters are specified, the output is a collection of **System.String** objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 *清單* 和 *AsString* 參數會指定，則輸出為一系列 **System.String** 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet and the Get-WinEvent cmdlet are not supported in Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式，Get-winevent 指令程式不適用於 Windows 預先安裝環境 (Windows PE)。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Clear-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Clear-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Limit-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Limit-EventLog

trans-unit.source: New-EventLog
trans-unit.target: New-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Remove-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Remove-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Show-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Show-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Write-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Write-EventLog
